functions.name: getPref
functions.description: Returns the value of the given legacy pref

functions.name: clearPref
functions.description: Clears the value of the given legacy pref

functions.name: getClippingsFromJSONFile
functions.description: Returns the data from the Clippings JSON data file, or null if file does not exist. Throws exception if failed to read data file

functions.name: insertClipping
functions.description: Inserts clipping into most recent active message composer window
